title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.24 - Freight having an offensive odor or likely to damage other freight or make any portion of the terminal untenantable subject to immediate removal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.24 - Freight having an offensive odor or likely to damage other freight or make any portion of the terminal untenantable subject to immediate removal

State Regulations

Freight having an offensive odor, or freight which is
likely to damage other freight or make any portion of the terminal
untenantable, is subject to immediate removal by the Port Authority from the
truck terminal or to other locations within the terminal; in such cases removal
will be at the expense and risk of the carrier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
